wikitext.*:
'''Ernil''' means prince in [[Sindarin]].
==Etymology==
Perhaps composed of ''[[arn]]'' "noble" and ending ''[[-il]]''.

Possible [[Old Sindarin]] form could be *''arnillo''.
==Examples==
*[[Dor-en-Ernil]]
*[[Ernil i Pheriannath]]
==See also==
Other words for "prince" are ''[[caun]]'' and ''[[cund]]''
